title: What Gives Cover?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 33 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Animals and people need cover for a variety of reasons. What Gives Cover? provides students an up-close look at some interesting kinds of protection and shelter. Repetitive sentences and detailed illustrations support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the problem and solution in text, as well as how to write complete sentences.
meta: cave, cover, log, mushroom, tent, umbrella
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word gives

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
